aboutMe: I am a vibrant individual with a strong desire for knowledge and a heart full of positivity. You will always find me smiling and joyful. I navigate the world with eager curiosity, always looking for new skills to add to my pockets. During my relentless pursuit of learning, I discovered the fascinating world of coding, and it was love at first code! There's something incredibly exciting about the language of computers and creating digital wonders from just pixels. When I'm not lost in lines of code, you'll likely find me in the kitchen. Cooking isn't just a hobby for me, it's a creative outlet where I sprinkle a dash of passion and a pinch of experimentation into every dish. Oh, and did I mention I'm a linguistic juggler? Fluent in isiXhosa and English. With an infectious enthusiasm, a skillet in one hand, and a keyboard in the other, I'm ready to embark on new adventures, tackle fresh challenges, and sprinkle a little laughter along the way.

hardSkills.name: HTML
hardSkills.description: I use HTML to create the foundational structure of webpages, including defining headings, paragraphs, images, links, and forms.

hardSkills.name: CSS
hardSkills.description: I use CSS  to style and layout webpages. It helps me design visually appealing websites by controlling colors, fonts, spacing, and positioning of elements.

hardSkills.name: Bootstrap
hardSkills.description: I use Bootstrap to streamline and enhance web development. Bootstrap is a popular front-end framework that provides pre-styled components and responsive layout utilities.

hardSkills.name: JavaScript
hardSkills.description: I use JavaScript to add interactivity and functionality to webpages. It is versatile and it allows me to manipulate webpage elements, handle user events, perform calculations, and interact with servers.

hardSkills.name: Git & Github
hardSkills.description: I use Git for version control, which helps me track changes in my codebase, collaborate with others, and revert to previous versions when needed. GitHub is a platform where I store my Git repositories remotely.

hardSkills.name: MySQL
hardSkills.description: I use MySQL to design, manage, and optimize relational databases, ensuring data integrity and efficient querying. I create structured databases, write complex queries, and integrate them seamlessly with web applications to handle and store data securely.

hardSkills.name: NodeJs
hardSkills.description: I use Node.js to build dynamic, server-side applications, leveraging its non-blocking, event-driven architecture to create efficient and scalable web solutions. From handling user authentication to managing databases, I ensure smooth backend operations for modern web apps.

softSkills.name: Time Management
softSkills.description: Time management is a crucial skill that I employ to prioritize tasks effectively, set achievable goals, and optimize productivity. It involves planning my schedule, allocating time for different activities.

softSkills.name: Problem Solving
softSkills.description: Problem solving is a key skill I apply to identify issues, analyze root causes, and develop effective solutions. It involves breaking down complex problems into manageable parts, using logical reasoning and creativity to explore different approaches.

softSkills.name: Communication
softSkills.description: Communication is essential for conveying ideas, collaborating effectively, and building relationships. I use clear and concise language to articulate concepts, actively listen to others to understand their perspectives. and adapt my communication style to different audiences.

softSkills.name: Collaboration
softSkills.description: Collaboration is vital for achieving shared goals and leveraging diverse skills and perspectives. I collaborate by communicating openly, respecting others' contributions, and actively participating in team discussions. I contribute ideas, listen to feedback.

softSkills.name: Empathy
softSkills.description: I practice empathy by listening actively to colleagues , considering their perspectives, and acknowledging their emotions and experiences. By empathizing, I build stronger relationships, improve communication, and foster a supportive and inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and understood.

testimonials.name: Caitlin Dalwai
testimonials.testimony: Having worked alongside Akhona in our journey at Life Choices Academy I can confidently say that any company who hires her is lucky to have her on board. Akhona is hard working and always determined to find a solution, she never gives up. She is not only intelligent, but also has an energy that can lift up anyones mood.

testimonials.name: Chloe Smith
testimonials.testimony: Observing Akhona's dedication and progress in our web development course has been truly inspiring. Her commitment to mastering coding and design fundamentals is evident in every task she undertakes. Akhona's tenacity and problem-solving skills shine through as she navigates through the complexities of the course material. Moreover, her positive attitude and willingness to help others create a supportive learning environment. I have no doubt that Akhona's passion and determination will lead her to excel in her web development journey.

testimonials.name: Matthew Brown
testimonials.testimony: Akhona is an extremely hard working and goal- driven individual. She always strives for excellence and always has found solutions to overcome any challenge.

testimonials.name: Sihlandlo Makhumsha
testimonials.testimony: Having Akhona in your team brings enlightenment.  She's a refreshing soul, and her having a type six enneagram personality benefits the team's objectives as she foresees hurdles and foster cooperation.

testimonials.name: Yolanda Matiwane
testimonials.testimony: Akhona is strong-willed, determinant and intelligent person. She is easy going and relatable which makes working with her a delight. She always manages to keep everyone's spirit up with her bubbly personality, and has impeccable work ethics

testimonials.name: Zizipho Copiso
testimonials.testimony: Working with Akhona has been an absolute pleasure! Her exceptional professionalism, combined with her friendly and approachable demeanor, made our collaboration a seamless and enjoyable experience. She is so down to earth, loving, caring, literally gets along with everyone around her. She was the type to always push me to do my best with whatever I did which I appreciate to this day! She was such a great friend and acquantance.
